remarks: Closure of the value of a vector (functional) in the closed kernel dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvbasecl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvbasecl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvbasecl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcdvbasecl.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvbasecl.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lcdvbasecl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvbasecl.e $e |- E = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvbasecl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvbasecl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. E ) $.
lcdvbasecl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcdvbasecl $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) e. R ) $.
